ModMetaData.name: Rimcuisine 2: Unofficial Biome Patches
ModMetaData.author: tuzet2
ModMetaData.description:
This mod patches biomes added by other mods, so they can grow biome specific plants from Rimcuisine 2. This mod is aimed to be balanced for the specific biome. Normally only generic crops may be grown in them. The only dependencies are the four Rimcuisine 2 mods by Mlie (core, meals and munchies, bottling and booze, smokes and shrooms), biome mods are optional.
Currenty patched mods: Alpha Biomes Rainbeau's Realistic Planets ReGrowth: Aspen ReGrowth: Core (WARNING: ReGrowth: Core MUST be loaded before ALL Rimcuisine 2 mods including mine)
